content.p: Open during term time: Monday to Friday, 9am to 5pm The Self-access centre is the ideal place to study if you're interested in languages. It's a quiet sanctuary for independent learning, offering a variety of language facilities and resources. Location: Room C66, Trent Building, University Park campus Telephone: 0115 951 5863 This is a service which lets staff and students record recent television and radio programmes. Most terrestrial freeview channels are available. More information about Box of Broadcasts. Kanopy is a film streaming platform which staff and students can sign up to for free. The collection contains over 26,000 documentaries, training videos and feature films which can be streamed from any location on various devices. More information about Kanopy. Tandem is a fun and free way for students and staff to practise and exchange their native language skills in tandem with a language partner. Tandem matches participants who then meet weekly to exchange their native language skills. Please contact a member of staff if you are interested in participating in the Tandem scheme.
